comment.author: 13639096@N06
comment._content:
It looks to me like part of that old tradition of the office picnic, which I remember as a child. Though the ones I remember usually involved some sort of organised sport (like a cricket match), which required more open ground.
Aha, I was right.  The mystery hike has been office organised (F.J Palmer & Sons Pty Ltd, and the 'sport' is the mystery hike.... )

comment.author: 18218591@N03
comment._content: I love it that there is only one car in the middle. It looks like they all squeezed in.
